#summary Create DORIS slant2h output from comprefdem.
#labels Phase-Support,Help

USAGE:
{{{
	dem2slant2h 
}}}
DESCRIPTION:
 DEM2SLANT2H is an internal ADORE command. <br>
 It creates DORIS slant2h output from comprefdem. 

INPUT:
 There are no required input parameters for this command.
 
OUTPUT:
  Adds slant2h step to `${i_resfile}`.
